//BottomNavBar Settings Cards Decks Campaigns
//Settings screen strings Account RangersDB This app works just fine without an account.\nBut signing in will allow you to sync campaigns and decks between devices and with RangersDB. Sign in to app Sign in/up to app Email address Password Sign in to your account Create a new account Sign out Delete your account Sign out of RangersDB? Confirm account deletion Are you sure you want to sign out of RangersDB?\n\nAny campaigns you uploaded or have had shared with you and decks from RangersDB will be removed from this device. They can be resynced if you sign in again.\n\nNote: if you have made recent changes while offline, they may be lost. Cancel Done Account name Friends

Update cards Rules Authentication failed. Invalid password. It must be 6 characters minimum. Invalid email. Account successfully deleted. Invalid credentials. Sorry, this handle has already been taken. Invalid handle. It must be between 2 and 22 characters long. Socials Chat with other Earthborne Rangers players: Discord Telegram Support Support Rangers Cards on %s. About Backup Data Diagnostics Contact us
//About screen The information presented in this app about Earthborne Rangers, both literal and graphical, is copyrighted by Earthborne Games. This app is not produced, endorsed, supported, or affiliated with Earthborne Games.\n\nThis application was created by Eugene Karelin as a fan project to help support the Earthborne Rangers community. If you find yourself managing lots of decks and campaigns, I\'m hoping it proves useful. Feedback and bug reports are welcome by email at %s Many thanks to RangersDB.com for providing the structured data, API access and access to card images. Without their continued support, this project wouldn\'t be possible. Icon Attribution:
